widget.name: CAMUN 2016
widget.description: In order to develop outstanding and sustaining leadership and communication skills, MUN was introduced in 2008 at the Cambridge High School, Abu Dhabi as an extra-curricular club activity. Starting with just 8 students, we presently have 150 and MUN in the school has grown from being a small part of our activities programme, to being a seminal influence on our studentsâ€™ learning, as they develop various skills to become articulate, forceful leaders.
widget.author: Lavesh Panjwani
